Compliance Verification Visits

### Description

Follow this solicitation notice on SAP Ariba: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13895999

Amendment to Closing Time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by September 12, 2022 at 2:00 pm ET. All bids submitted after 2:00 pm ET will be declared non-responsive.

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Public Health Agency of Canada, has a requirement for service providers to provide resources for compliance verification visits with travelers in quarantine or isolation. These visits aim to verify compliance with the Minimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order, also known as the Quarantine, Isolation and Other Obligations Order.

### Contact Information

Please contact Sophie Cayer at [sophie.cayer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sophie.cayer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for more information on this solicitation.

### Regions

This solicitation is open to the following regions:

* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Ontario (except NCR)
* Saskatchewan
* New Brunswick
* Manitoba
* British Columbia
* Yukon
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Nova Scotia
* Quebec (except NCR)
* Prince Edward Island
